short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translating fantasy football writing into English

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At When Pigskins Fly our goal is to make fantasy football accessible to all.  This extension is another attempt to do just that.  It uses simple word and phrase replacement to help translate online fantasy football articles into plain english.
